actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that time spent by American civilians in enemy prisoner-of-war camps and similar places shall be creditable (as though it were military service) toward pensions, annuities, or similar benefits under various Federal retirement programs.

summary.text: Provides that time spent by American civilians in enemy prisoner-of-war camps and similar places shall be creditable, as military service toward pensions, annuities, or similar benefits under various Federal retirement programs.

titles.title: A bill to provide that time spent by American civilians in enemy prisoner-of-war camps and similar places shall be creditable (as though it were military service) toward pensions, annuities, or similar benefits under various Federal retirement programs.
